src:
Persebaya Terancam Tanpa Miswar Saputra Hadapi Tira Persikabo
05 Nov 2019, 18:39 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persebaya Surabaya terancam tanpa Miswar Saputra ketika menghadapi Tira Persikabo, Sabtu (9/11/2019). Penjaga gawang asal Aceh tersebut belum sepenuhnya fit setelah demam.
Miswar juga belum bergabung dalam latihan Persebaya di Stadion Gelora Delta Sidoarjo. Bekas kiper Persiraja Banda Aceh itu masih diminta beristirahat oleh dokter.
"Miswar sakit, badannya sakit, tadi sih sudah mau ikut latihan cuma sama dokter masih dilarang," kata pelatih Persebaya, Aji Santoso, Selasa (5/11/2019).
"Karena kondisinya juga masih 80 persen, masih ada demam. Jadi saya izinkan untuk tidak latihan," imbuh juru taktik asal Kepanjen, Kabupaten Malang tersebut.
Miswar Saputra merupakan andalan Persebaya di sektor penjaga gawang. Dia sudah bermain sebanyak 24 kali dari total 25 pertandingan yang telah dijalani Green Force pada kompetisi Shopee Liga 1 2019.

Scroll ke bawah untuk informasi selengkapnya ya Bolaneters.
text:
Persebaya Threatened Without Miswar Saputra Face Tira Persikabo
05 Nov 2019, 18:39 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persebaya Surabaya threatened without Miswar Saputra when facing Tira Persikabo, Saturday (11/09/2019). The Aceh goal keeper is not fully fit after the fever.
Miswar also hasn't joined Persebaya training at the Sidoarjo Delta Gelora Stadium. The former Persiraja Banda Aceh keeper was still asked to rest by the doctor.
"Miswar is sick, his body is sick, but I already want to take part in training only with doctors, which is still prohibited," said Persebaya coach, Aji Santoso, Tuesday (11/05/2019).
"Because the condition is also still 80 percent, there is still a fever. So I allow it to not practice," added the interpreter of tactics from Kepanjen, Malang Regency.
Miswar Saputra is a mainstay of Persebaya in the goalkeeper sector. He has played 24 times out of a total of 25 games Green Force has played in the 2019 Shopee League competition.

Scroll down for more information, Bolaneters.
